name: Paul Johnston - trying to be civil (as a service)

content.html: One thing I love about Twitter that I simply don't get from other social media which is based on real life interactions? I chose to follow diverse people. Diverse gender, geography, ideology, and many more. People I will never meet but people I can and have learned from.
content.value:
One thing I love about Twitter that I simply don't get from other social media which is  based on real life interactions?

I chose to follow diverse people.

Diverse gender, geography, ideology, and many more.

People I will never meet but people I can and have learned from.
